values: Preserving Your Joy in God (with Portuguese Interpretation)Preserving Your Joy in God (with Portuguese Interpretation)

To maintain joy in God, you must fight for it — but God has already won the victory in Jesus Christ. Therefore, you can fight even in the dark with gutsy guilt.To maintain joy in God, you must fight for it — but God has already won the victory in Jesus Christ. Therefore, you can fight even in the dark with gutsy guilt.
